document_api_meta.title: Create Return
document_api_meta.env_desc: Use this API to initiate a return request on behalf of the buyer Sellers can reject the request, or accept and issue: -Return and Refund (buyer must send package back) -Returnless Refund (buyer can keep the item) -Partial Refund (Seller issues a partial refund, buyer can keep the item)

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: ^sku_id
request_body_param.desc: Sku id seller wants to create a return request

request_body_param.name: ^quantity
request_body_param.desc: Quantity seller wants to create a return request

request_body_param.name: order_line_item_ids
request_body_param.desc: Order line ids seller wants to create return request, should use order line ids to create return request if had split parcel to multiple packages, default value is all order line ids in the order if not input order_line_ids and skus

request_body_param.name: return_reason
request_body_param.desc: Seller's reason to create a return

request_body_param.name: return_type
request_body_param.desc:
Which type to create: 
- REFUND
- RETURN_AND_REFUND

request_body_param.name: refund_total
request_body_param.desc:
Total refund amount to the buyer. 
The total refund amount can not exceed the refundable amount

request_body_param.name: currency
request_body_param.desc: Currency for refund which should be same as currency in TikTok Ship Order.

request_body_param.name: shipment_type
request_body_param.desc:
How buyer ships items to seller when in a return request, could be:
- PLATFORM
- BUYER_ARRANGE

request_body_param.name: handover_method
request_body_param.desc:
Which handover method buyer chooses to use when returning goods to seller by platform
- DROP_OFF
- PICKUP

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^return_id
response_param.desc: The identifier of a specific return request.

response_param.name: ^return_status
response_param.desc:
Return status, available values:
- RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_PENDING: Request is pending, needs to be approved by seller or platform
- REFUND_OR_RETURN_REQUEST_REJECT: Seller rejected the request
- AWAITING_BUYER_SHIP: Waiting buyer to ship items to seller, if exceed the deadline, request will be closed by platform
- BUYER_SHIPPED_ITEM: Buyer has shipped items to seller.
- REJECT_RECEIVE_PACKAGE: Seller reject return package
- RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_SUCCESS: The refund/return request is successful, buyer will be refunded.
- RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_CANCEL: The request has been cancelled by buyer or system
- RETURN_OR_REFUND_REQUEST_COMPLETE: The request is successful, and the amount has been refunded.

error_code_list.msg: An invalid request parameter was passed. Please check that you have the correct parameter type(s) and format.
A return request has already been completed, or the order has already been cancelled.
A return request is already in process, or the order has already been cancelled.
Unknown return reason. Please ensure you are passing a valid return reason.
The provided return reason cannot be used by the seller. Please select a valid return reason and try again.
The provided return reason is currently offline. Please select a different return reason.
Return package creation has failed due to internal error.
Return request has failed due to an interception by TikTok risk control.
Not allowed to return or cancel since order is completed or cancelled
Refund total amount is larger than the refundable amount.
Unable to cancel individual line items within this request.
The requested line item(s) for return or refund exceeds the allowable limit.
No permission to process this order
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func returnRefund202309CreateReturnPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ReturnRefundV202309API.ReturnRefund202309ReturnsPost(context.Background())
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.IdempotencyKey("1623812664")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody := returnRefund_v202309.NewReturnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody()
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetOrderId("576473917261320779")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkus := returnRefund_v202309.NewReturnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkus()
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkus.SetSkuId("1729386416015578024")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkus.SetQuantity(1)
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkusList := []returnRefund_v202309.ReturnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkus{*returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkus}
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetSkus(returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodySkusList)
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList := []string{"455764739172614518516"}
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetOrderLineItemIds(returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBodyOrderLineItemIdsList)
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetReturnReason("ecom_order_delivered_refund_reason_missing_product_seller")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetReturnType("REFUND")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetRefundTotal("10.5")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetCurrency("USD")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetShipmentType("PLATFORM")
    returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody.SetHandoverMethod("DROP_OFF")
    request = request.ReturnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody(*returnRefund202309CreateReturnRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on seller's behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of seller's orders.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to fulfil and manage orders on your behalf, and provide real-time updates on the status of your orders.

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's return and refund requests.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your return and refund requests.
